messages.content: Earlier this year, I left the Conservative Party because it had shifted beyond recognition. It is now in the grip of its right-wing and has no room for moderate views. It has also abandoned any serious commitment to tackling burning injustices.

messages.title: I just couldn't stay with the Conservative Party.
messages.content: Its relentless determination to push ahead with Brexit, no matter what the cost, has divided the country and put so much at risk. Urgent problems - like climate change, widening inequality, the lack of affordable housing and our overstretched NHS - have been neglected.

messages.title: That's why earlier this year, like 26,000 others in the last 6 months, I joined the Liberal Democrats.
messages.content: Under Jo Swinson, a Liberal Democrat government will create a shared vision for this country we want to be, where every single person and community is valued, empowered and cared for, and where we protect our planet for future generations.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Opposes the Conservative Party's approach to pushing ahead with Brexit, highlighting the risk and division it causes.
Acknowledges issues such as climate change, inequality, lack of affordable housing, and the state of the NHS as areas needing attention.
Promotes the values of the Liberal Democrats under Jo Swinson to create a country with empowered individuals, strong communities, and care for the environment.

issues.brexitEurope: Brexit, no matter what the cost, has divided the country and put so much at risk.
issues.economy: The prospect of No-Deal-Brexit has already put our economy in reverse.
issues.environment: Protect our planet for future generations.
issues.governance: A Liberal Democrat government will create a shared vision for the country.
issues.health: Our overstretched NHS has been neglected.

leaflet.personalStatement: P.S. If Remainers come together, we can combat the hatred and division at the extremes of the Conservative and Labour parties. We can build a brighter future.
leaflet.additionalNotes: Message emphasizes the shift of the Conservative Party to the right and Sarah's disagreement with this change, leading to her joining the Liberal Democrats.
